content:
PhD position at ZHAW ICT-Accessibility Lab in a Swiss national project (funded by Bridge Discovery) in the area of document accessibility (PDF accessibility) for visually impaired people.

Zurich University of Applied Sciences ZHAW is one of Switzerland’s largest multidisciplinary universities of applied sciences, with over 13,000 students and 3,000 faculty and staff.

https://www.zhaw.ch/de/jobs/offene-stellen/stelleninserat/job/detail/SAST8166.1/

PhD position in Deep Learning 80% | ZHAW Zürcher Hochschule für Angewandte Wissenschaften
Angewandte Linguistik
